subject: Cussing EVP
author: James W. Hyslope
full_text: Hi guys :) I am new to EVP, but I was able to purchase a NEW sealed in package Panasonic RR-DR60 from eBay for $130 shipped (I included an extra $10 to get priority shipping WITH insurance) This DR60 has been truly AMAZING!! I have a question. I have 2 EVP's that have cursing words in them. The "F" word. One is from a female saying " I hit it.....Fu$k" and another Male (?) sorta mechanical (original mechanical voice without editing) that says "HEY....we don't give a fu$k" CAN I UPLOAD these (are very clear) female is lower audio, but the male is easier to hear (although his vowles are not as clear) Or would this be PROHIBITED. I don't want to offend anyone, just would like to give the true results as they are....we DO get some "negative" results sometimes. Please advise. Thanks. Jim H
